pages.text: The Activator Series of tools has the ability to give a temporary Redstone signal at the point of physical contact depending on the specific trigger of ecah tool. These tools are stronger and faster than iron, but weaker than diamond tools. The Sword responds to striking, Pickaxe to breaking blocks, Axe to breaking and stripping logs, Shovel to breaking and paving paths, Hoe to breaking and tilling. Traits are customizable [WIP]
